title: Projecto: A Comprehensive Networking and Career Development Platform
summary: Full-stack networking platform connecting students, alumni, and professionals with real-time project proposals, mentorship, spotlight sections, and interactive live feed.

title: OnlyICanWatch – Secure PDF Viewer
summary: Secure PDF viewer preventing download, print, and copy access using protected routes and safe in-browser rendering.

title: Authify – Secure Authentication & User Access System
summary: Full authentication system with signup/login, JWT, password hashing, OTP-based email verification, and secure role-based access.

title: RateSpace – User Review & Rating Platform
summary: Platform where authenticated users rate and review items with real-time updates, spam control, and validation.

title: Resumo – AI-Powered Resume Evaluation Tool
summary: AI-driven resume evaluator that analyzes keywords, generates scores, and gives improvement suggestions using GPT-based insights.
